duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a medical-surgical setting, attending to the needs of adult patients with diverse medical conditions.
Utilize clinical skills to assess, plan, implement, and evaluate patient care plans.
Document patient data and interventions in Electronic Medical Record (EMR) systems.
Administer wound care and educate patients on post-treatment care and self-care strategies.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to ensure coordinated and effective patient care.
Apply critical thinking and adaptability to handle complex and urgent patient care situations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) or Associate Degree in Nursing (ADN)
